subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Historic Buildings and Sites
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers’ former spring training site in Vero Beach, Fla., now called Historic Dodgertown, has found new life as a multisports complex.
snippet: The Dodgers’ former spring training site in Vero Beach, Fla., now called Historic Dodgertown, has found new life as a multisports complex.
